bibl.title: The New Vindolanda Writing-tablets.
bibl.note: Discusses the linguistic features of the texts published in T. Vindol. III. - Introduction. - II. Punctuation. - III. Vowels and Diphthongs. - IV. Consonants. - V. Morphology. - VI. Syntax. - VII. Lexicon. - VIII. Conclusions.
bibl.seg: ADAMS J.N., The New Vindolanda Writing-tablets.

Discusses the linguistic features of the texts published in T. Vindol. III. - Introduction. - II. Punctuation. - III. Vowels and Diphthongs. - IV. Consonants. - V. Morphology. - VI. Syntax. - VII. Lexicon. - VIII. Conclusions.
